show.showDesc:
Go behind the scenes with WWE's hottest
female wrestlers!

Even though things are changing for the Kardashian-
Jenner family in ways they never expected, they're
determined to remember that family always comes first.

Welcome to Revenge Body, the show that is going to turn
lives around with the ultimate true and total makeover of
the exterior and interior.

episode.episodeTitle: Now That's a Lot of Schnitzel
episode.episodeDesc: For the Quickfire, Padma and Richard Blais inspire the chefs using Tasty online videos and challenge them to transform the most laborious dishes from their own menus into accessible thirty minute dishes for home cooks.
Season13 Episode8 description goes here.
Season13 Episode9 description goes here.

CIA bosses are furious that the mission to apprehend James Kendrick was apparently a failure. They instruct Michael to bring him to justice within 48 hours, or pay the price of failure. Sam and Jesse, dubious of Michael's intentions, use a tracker to follow him to a secret meeting with Kendrick and learn that their colleague has switched sides.
